scripts.build-gateway: docker build -f devops/gateway.Dockerfile -t gateway . && docker tag gateway someonesdockerhubid/gateway && docker push someonesdockerhubid/gateway
scripts.build-websocket: docker build -f devops/websocket.Dockerfile -t websocket-demo . && docker tag websocket-demo someonesdockerhubid/websocket-demo && docker push someonesdockerhubid/websocket-demo
scripts.build-basicgram: docker build -f devops/basicgram.Dockerfile -t basicgram-demo . && docker tag basicgram-demo someonesdockerhubid/basicgram-demo && docker push someonesdockerhubid/basicgram-demo
scripts.build-frontend: docker build -f devops/frontend.Dockerfile -t react-demo . && docker tag react-demo someonesdockerhubid/react-demo && docker push someonesdockerhubid/react-demo
scripts.build-all-docker: npm run build-frontend && npm run build-gateway && npm run build-websocket && npm run build-basicgram
scripts.deploy: swarm init && docker-compose -f devops/docker-compose.yml pull && docker stack deploy -c devops/docker-compose.yml message-app
